plot: Short documentary about the Spanish war in Africa, where it's possible to see how the Spanish troops take the mount Gurugu.
title: Toma del Gurugu

plot_en: Short documentary about the Spanish war in Africa, where it's possible to see how the Spanish troops take the mount Gurugu.
